reviewText: One of de Funes last films. A must watch. Despite his old age, he always gave 100% in all of his films, and produced comedy magic for the audience!

We are a family of Louis de Funes fans.  It was a marvelous film, very near Rene Fallet book.
You really have to be a fluent francophone to understand the humor.  Not for first year French students:)
If you understand French, this will be your favorite comedy for life.  I first saw it while stationed in Belgium.  I am still laughing.
Spectacle formidable - la produit a ete envoyee rapidement - je l'ai recue en moins d'une semaine de l'achat - feliciations!
